CustomField.description: JSON array defining mutually exclusive operating modes for this action. When populated, the configurator shows a variant picker and only exposes the config fields and parameter fields relevant to the chosen variant. Each variant object must include: name (string), label (string), description (string), configFields (array, same format as ConfigSchema__c), parameterFields (array, same format as ParametersSchema__c), configJsonSchema (object), parametersJsonSchema (object). Actions without this field behave exactly as before.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: JSON array of variant definitions. Example: [{"name":"direct","label":"Direct Content","description":"LLM provides subject and body","configFields":[...],"parameterFields":[...],"configJsonSchema":{...},"parametersJsonSchema":{...}}]
CustomField.label: Supported Variants
